images.copyright: Cocoa pods from Ambanja, Madagascar (© pierivb/Getty Images)
images.title: A chocolate lover's favorite fruit
images.caption: World Chocolate Day
images.desc: Happy World Chocolate Day! Hidden inside these colorful pods are cocoa seeds, or beans, which will be fermented, roasted, and ground on their way to being turned into chocolate, a sweet treat with a worldwide fanbase.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
